name: filminess
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being very thin or almost transparent: The filminess of the fabric makes it possible to see her legs. Rub the entire surface until the filminess disappears and the wax is clear. See
filmy
More examplesFewer examplesThe filminess of the curtains means they let all the light in.The ale is dark brown, with some filminess.An important index of rice varieties is filminess.It has a light filminess but not quite translucent.
